linksPageHanuutText: Discover a seamless shopping experience with our app. Download Hanuut now and start shopping!
linksPageMyHanuutText: Simplify your operations, boost efficiency, and grow your business. Download My Hanuut and take your grocery shop to the next level!
innovative: An innovative mobile app for delivery
welcomeToTawsila: Welcome to our platform! We're excited to have you join our community of drivers. To get started, please follow the steps
pleaseTakeAMoment: Please take a moment to review our
submitToRules: . By submitting your subscription request, you agree to abide by these terms and conditions.
fillTheSubscription: Fill out the subscription request form below with your contact information and relevant details.
reviewConditions: Review the terms and conditions carefully before submitting your request.
clickToSubmit: Click the Submit button to send your subscription request  to our team for review.
enterPhoneToSubOrCheck: Enter your phone number to check your subscribe request
clickToDownload: Click the link to download the app
acceptanceAfterSubmittingRequest: After submitting your subscribe request, our team will diligently review the information you provided.
onceRequestAccepted: Once your request is accepted, we will notify you of your acceptance. Congratulations! You're now officially a part of our driver community.
toGetStartedWithTawsila: To get started, simply provide your phone number and find the download link for the app. Click on it to visite the download page. Our user-friendly app is designed to provide you with a seamless experience and access to the tools you need.
openYourAccount: Open your account on our platform by providing the required information.
fillInformation: Fill in your personal details and vehicle information accurately.
submitDocs: Submit the necessary documents for verification and validation.
ourTeamWillReviewAndVerify: Our team will carefully review the information provided and verify your submitted documents. Once your data and documents have been successfully validated, you will receive approval.
congratulationsAccepted: Congratulations! You are now eligible to go online as an active driver.
loginAndOnline: Log in to our driver app and set your availability status to 'online.'
startReceivingMission: You'll start receiving mission requests from our system,  matching you with suitable tasks.
AcceptMissionToWork: Accept missions and provide excellent service to our customers.
purchaseSuccess: Your order has been successfully processed. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.
purchaseFailure: We apologize for the inconvenience. There was an issue processing your order. We value your business and will make every effort to resolve the issue.
homeSmallerParagraph: Free on the Google Play Store.
aboutUsParagraph: In a world of anonymous sellers and risky online transactions, we wanted to bring back trust. Hanuut was built to digitize the local, face-to-face shopping experience you rely on. Our platform is a simple promise: to connect you with verified neighborhood businesses, so you can shop online with total peace of mind.
aboutUsAlt: Illustration of a friendly shop owner at a counter
howItWorksStep1_alt: Woman on sofa browsing shops on her phone
howItWorksStep2_alt: Mobile phone showing a shopping cart
howItWorksShoping: Choose the store that suits you, explore a well-organized list of products, and add the items you want to purchase to your virtual shopping cart.
howItWorkCartManagment: provide your delivery address and select your preferred method of receiving the order. This will allow us to ensure that your items are delivered to the correct location and in the way that is most convenient for you.
howItWorksDelivery: Simply wait at your doorstep, as our driver will be arriving shortly to deliver your order. You can track the status of your delivery using our app.
valuesConvenienceText: We provide a convenient shopping experience by allowing customers to shop online, access a wider range of products in many domains, and receive delivery services directly to their doorstep.
valuesTrustText: We prioritize trust and security by protecting customer information and offering excellent customer support. Transparent pricing, clear return policies, and a loyalty program for customer.
valuesPricingText: We promote competitive pricing and quality by encouraging healthy competition among sellers, leading to lower prices and higher quality products. Access to reviews, ratings, and comparisons helps customers make confident purchases.
404Text: We couldn't find the page you were looking for.
partnerSubHeading: Manage your inventory, track sales, and launch promotions to attract more customers.
partnerParagraph: Create your online shop, receive orders online, and manage your inventory seamlessly , My Hanuut helps you to grow your business. Download the app now!
partnerSmallerParagraph: By entering your email, you agree to receive emails from hanuut.
partnerInputTextForm: Choose the domain of your business
partnerInputTextFormOther: Enter the domain of your business
partnersFormThankYouSubTitle: you have been successfully joined our waiting list. Our team will reach you soon
partnersValue1Description: Today, every customer has a smartphone with internet access. So why not put your store in their pockets? With My Hanuut, open your online shop and attract more customers effortlessly.
partnersValue2Description: Keep all your products in one place, categorized and easy to update anytime. My Hanuut makes store management seamless and more professional.
partnersValue3Description: Receive online orders, track sales, and analyze your business with precise data to make better decisions and boost your profits.
partnersFormFirstStepSubHeading: and easily bring your business online
partnersFormFirstStepParagraph: Enter your phone number to subscribe or check the progess of your subscribtion
partnersFirstStepDescription2: Stay in touch. You can check your subscription in the same form
partnersSecondStepDescriptions1: After accepting your request, we will give you access to our app
partnersSecondStepDescriptions2: Install the up, and setup your Online Shop
partnerThirdStepDescription1: Recieve online orders from our customers and don't bother yourself with delivery
partnerThirdStepDescription2: Keep your inverentory updated in real-time
sorryNoShopAvailable: Sorry, there are currently no shops available
errorPhoneNotValid: please enter a valid phone number
messagePhoneIsUsed: Your request is still being treated by Hanuut team. Stay in touch, we will reach you soon
deleteAccountMessage: Your account deletion request will be processed within 48 hours. You will receive an email confirmation once it's completed.
tawsilaSubHeading: Deliver missions and get paid for them!
tawsilaText: Earn money delivering missions with TAWSILA! complete missions and get paid. Join our driver community now and start earning today!
subscribeRequestText: Welcome to our platform! We're thrilled to have you join our community of drivers. Get ready for an exciting experience!
confirmationText: After registering your subscription, our dedicated team will swiftly validate your request. Keep track of your subscription's status by simply clicking the link below. Stay informed!
validationText: You'll have the opportunity to create a new account, provide your information, and submit the necessary documents. Once completed, you can easily enable your account and start enjoying the benefits.
firstJoinStepText: Sign up a join request. You must be over 19 and have access to a vehicle
secondJoinStepText: After Hannut validation, you'll receive an email containing TAWSILA app and the instruction to install it
thirdJoinStepText: Go online, receive delivery mission and get paid for each one seperately
noDishesAvailable: No dishes available for this category
noProductsAvailable: No products are available in this category

testPaymentSubHeading: Please Note that this page is only for testing the integrity of online payment functions through SATIM
testPaymentParagraph: I hope you understand that SATIM payment gateway will be used in our Mobile Apps, and this is just a test page to give you a glance on our API functions
testPaymentParagraph2: In this page, you can test :
testPaymentTermsError: Please confirm the terms and conditions
discoverFeaturesParagraph: My Hanuut offers three tailored versions: restaurants get an interactive digital menu, grocery stores enable live shopping by scanning products, and e-commerce shops have a dedicated page showcasing all their products. Each version comes with customized features and a fully functional online store ready for customer orders.‚ú®
PartnerCtaDescription: Join the merchants who trust My Hanuut to grow their business. Get instant access to guides designed for your growth. üìà
digitalMenuDescription: Transform your menu into an interactive digital experience. Real-time updates, QR code integration, and multi-language support help your vendors showcase their offerings. Perfect for restaurants, cafes, and food markets! üéØ
paymentsDescription: Securely accept online payments and manage transactions with ease.
foodShopsDescription: Easily build a digital menu by adding dishes with ingredients, images, and prices. Update your menu anytime to impress your customers. ‚ú®
socialMediaDescription: Manage your dishes effortlessly. Add, edit, or remove items with a few clicks and keep your menu always up-to-date. üî•
orderControlDescription: Integrate orders with our built-in POS system. Receive real-time updates and ensure fast, efficient service for every order. üì±
seamlessPaymentsDescription: Add products swiftly by scanning barcodes or entering details manually. Save time and keep your inventory updated effortlessly. üì¶
inventoryControlDescription: Manage shipments with ease. Track quantities, prices, and expiration dates to ensure your stock is always optimized. üöÄ
financialMasteryDescription: Receive alerts for low, near-expiry, and expired items. Stay on top of inventory and make timely restocking decisions. üìà
onlineOfflineDescription: Design rich product pages with custom specs, detailed descriptions, and images that captivate and inform your customers. üí™
smartOrderDescription: Offer diverse options like color and size variants. Give your customers a personalized shopping experience with easy selection. üåü
orderManagementDescription: Effortlessly manage orders and track sales. Enjoy a user-friendly dashboard with real-time analytics to boost your performance. üí∞
food_domain_examples: Food üçî [Restaurants, fast food, cloud kitchens, bakeries...etc]
ecom_domain_examples: General Ecommerce üëó[Clothing, furniture, books, tools, and more]
partnersPage_seo_description: Digitize your shop with My Hanuut. Manage inventory, process orders, and grow your customer base with our powerful and easy-to-use tools.
partnersPage_seo_keywords: my hanuut, online store, ecommerce algeria, sell online, digital storefront, small business tools
features_supermarkets_3_desc: Get automatic alerts for low-stock, near-expiry, and expired items, so you can make profitable decisions before it's too late.
features_food_3_desc: Receive and manage online orders directly in the app. Keep your kitchen efficient and your customers happy with real-time updates.
cta_section_description: Join the community of merchants who trust My Hanuut to bring their business online. Download the app and start your digital journey today.

satim_terms.main_title: Terms and Conditions for Online Payment

sections.title: Specific Conditions of Use for Online Payment
paragraphs: Preamble: These specific conditions of use for online payment via the EDAHABIA card or CIB cards, hereinafter referred to as 'CSU: Specific Conditions of Use,' apply to all online transactions established on the website www.hanuut.com or our mobile application Hanuut Customer. Any use of the online payment service via the EDAHABIA card on this site implies the prior and unconditional acceptance by the E-consumer of these CSU.

sections.title: 1. Purpose
paragraphs: These CSU aim to define the conditions and terms under which Hanuut Express offers the E-consumer holding an EDAHABIA card or CIB cards the use of the online payment service on its website www.hanuut.com or its mobile application Hanuut Customer.

sections.title: 2. Definitions
paragraphs: In accordance with these specific conditions of use, the following terms shall have the following meanings:
list_items: 2.1 ORDER: is the means by which the E-consumer agrees to purchase services sold by the E-SUPPLIER online, which, in turn, undertakes to deliver them in accordance with the current legislative and regulatory provisions.
2.2 E-SUPPLIER: SARL HANUUT EXPRESS, which offers the electronic provision of services defined in these CSU.
2.3 E-consumer: Any natural or legal person who acquires a service electronically from the E-SUPPLIER for final use.
2.4 Online store: the virtual shop for online services of the E-SUPPLIER.

2.5 ALGERIA POST MONETARY CARD OR CIB CARDS: Monetary cards linked to a Postal or banking Current Account, compliant with the required standards, constituting an authorized means of payment for electronic transactions.
2.6 SPECIFIC CONDITIONS OF USE 'CSU': All rules displayed on the E-SUPPLIER's online store governing the use of the electronic payment service accepted by the E-consumer.
2.7 ELECTRONIC PAYMENT: Service that allows the holder of the ALGERIA POST MONETARY CARD Eddahabia, as an E-consumer, to perform payment transactions for services on the E-SUPPLIER's online store.

sections.title: 3. Specific Conditions of Use
paragraphs: By checking the acceptance box during the purchase process, the customer confirms their unconditional acceptance of these terms and conditions of sale.
list_items: Access to the service is reserved for holders of the ALGERIA POST MONETARY CARD EDAHABIA or CIB cards, who have the right to use it on the Hanuut Express online payment site or its mobile application, and who have legal capacity. In general, this means that an individual must be at least 19 years old to become an E-consumer and place orders on the website www.hanuut.com or the Hanuut Customer mobile application.

The E-consumer must provide all the required information before validating their order. After selecting the service or product, it will be added to the payment receipt. Once the product or service choices are completed, the order is validated, and then the E-consumer will be asked to authenticate with a password.
The E-consumer is solely responsible for any input errors, especially those regarding the beneficiary's online payment number, and therefore assumes full responsibility.
The E-consumer can cancel their order without any conditions before its final validation.

In the event of a complaint by the E-consumer to Hanuut Express, they must provide all the evidence justifying their purchase (reason for the complaint, transaction amount, online payment receipt, date of debiting the transaction amount, account statement, etc.). The sale price of the product is the one in effect at the time of the order's registration, excluding any delivery fees that may be borne by the E-consumer and will be indicated at the time of order registration.
The prices mentioned in the catalog are indicated in DZD (Algerian dinar) including taxes, valid at the time of consultation by the E-consumer and at the time of order registration.
The payment receipt and transactions are denominated in DZD.
The minimum amount per transaction is 200 DZD.
The E-consumer has the right to file a claim for non-execution of the order with the E-supplier within 01 hour after validating their order (transaction), within a period of 15 days.

In the event of unavailability of the ordered product or service, the E-consumer will be informed as soon as possible and will have the option to cancel their order. They will then have the choice to either receive a full refund of the amounts paid within a maximum of 60 days from the date of payment or exchange the product or service.
The refund will be made to the E-consumer's account.
The E-consumer has the right to rectify their personal data.
The E-consumer may receive advertisements from the E-supplier unless they refuse the use of their personal data for marketing purposes.
The recorded transaction data constitutes proof of all past commercial transactions between the E-consumer and the E-supplier.
The account statement also serves as proof of transactions made with the Algerian Post Monetary Card via the website.

All products sold on the website are guaranteed against manufacturing defects and material flaws. The duration of this warranty is at least 12 months from the invoice date. This warranty does not cover damages resulting from accidents, misuse, or negligence on the part of the user.
Any fraudulent use of the service by the E-consumer will result in their automatic liability.

sections.title: 4. Confidentiality
list_items: All data provided by the E-consumer is necessary for order processing and is treated confidentially.
This confidentiality may be lifted in case of fraud or upon request by judicial authorities.

sections.title: 5. Obligation of the E-supplier
list_items: All data provided by the E-consumer is necessary for order processing and is treated confidentially.
This confidentiality may be lifted in case of fraud or upon request by judicial authorities.

sections.title: 6. Obligation of the customer
paragraphs: The E-consumer agrees to use the electronic payment service via the EDAHABIA card or CIB cards responsibly, in compliance with these terms and conditions, applicable laws, and regulations.

sections.title: 7. Termination
paragraphs: In case of non-compliance with these specific terms of use, Hanuut Express reserves the right, without compensation or prior notice, to suspend or close the user's account and refuse them all or part of the service in the future, without prejudice to any legal or contractual actions that may be taken against them.

sections.title: 8. Applicable law
paragraphs: These specific terms are subject to Algerian law. Any disputes of any nature that may arise between the E-consumer and the E-supplier regarding the interpretation, validity, and/or enforcement of these specific terms will be settled amicably by the Parties. In the absence of an amicable settlement, the disputes will be submitted to the competent Algerian jurisdiction.

sections.title: 9. Modification
paragraphs: Hanuut Express may modify or update these terms at any time without prior notice.

sections.title: 10. Effective date
paragraphs: The terms and conditions come into effect upon acceptance by the E-consumer or use of the service and remain valid until the acceptance of the product by the E-consumer and after the service is delivered.

sections.title: General terms and conditions of sale and online payment
paragraphs: Preamble: These general terms and conditions of sale govern all online transactions established on the website www.hanuut.com. Placing an order on this site implies the unconditional and irrevocable acceptance of these conditions by the web buyer.

These general terms and conditions of sale are the minimum required conditions that BNA (National Bank of Algeria) requests the web merchant to include on their website, and which the web buyer must acknowledge, accept, and agree to. The order validation can only be done if the web buyer accepts the provided conditions.

sections.title: 1. Object
paragraphs: This contract, subject to these general terms and conditions of sale, is a distance contract that aims to define the rights and obligations of the parties in the context of the online sale of products and services by the company SARL Hanuut Express through its online website www.hanuut.com or its mobile application Hanuut Customer.

sections.title: 2. Definitions
paragraphs: In this contract, each of the mentioned expressions shall have the meaning as defined below:
list_items: 2.1 Order form: a summary document that indicates the characteristics of the products ordered by the web buyer and must be signed by them ('double click') to commit and proceed with the payment.

2.2 Distance contract: any contract for the acquisition of products or services between the company SARL Hanuut Express and a web buyer within the framework of a system of distance selling or provision of services organized by the company SARL Hanuut Express, which exclusively uses the Internet until the conclusion of the contract.
2.3 Order: the act by which the web buyer commits to purchasing products and/or services, and the company SARL Hanuut Express commits to delivering them by any means necessary.
2.4 Force majeure: any event beyond the control of the parties, insurmountable, unforeseeable, and irresistible.

2.5 Web buyer: a customer of the web merchant on the Internet or a user of the online payment service. The web buyer refers to any individual or legal entity who has entered into an agreement with a card-issuing bank, resulting in the issuance of a payment and withdrawal bank card. In the context of online payment, the cardholder is a buyer who uses their card to make a payment for goods or services online.
2.6 Web merchant: refers to SARL Hanuut Express, which is an Algerian merchant operating a shop on the Internet. The web merchant benefits from the secure online payment service.

sections.title: 3. The General Conditions of Use for the online payment service are as follows:
paragraphs: By checking the acceptance box during the purchase process, the customer confirms their unconditional acceptance of these terms and conditions of sale.

Access to the service is reserved for CIB cardholders who have the right to use it on Hanuut Express's online payment site and who have legal capacity. In general, this means that an individual must be at least 19 years old to become a customer and place orders on the website www.hanuut.com or the Hanuut Customer mobile application.

All products and services in the catalog are marketed until stocks are depleted or the offered service is discontinued. Hanuut reserves the right to remove a product or service from the catalog without prior notice. In such cases, Hanuut cannot be held liable for compensation, cancellation of an order, or refund of the corresponding amount due to the inability to use the purchased product due to incompatibility with the web buyer's existing hardware or improper use by the web buyer.

The web buyer must provide all the required information before validating their order. After selecting the product or service, it will be added to the order form. Once the product or service choices are completed, the order is validated, and the web buyer will be asked to authenticate with a password.
The web buyer is solely responsible for input errors, especially those regarding the beneficiary number for online payment. Consequently, they will assume full responsibility.
The web buyer can cancel their order without any conditions before the final validation.

In case of a complaint from the web buyer to their bank or to Hanuut Express, they must provide all the evidence justifying their purchase (reason for the complaint, transaction amount, online payment receipt, transaction debit date, bank account statement, etc.).

The selling price of the product is the one in effect at the time of order registration, including the delivery fees that are the responsibility of the web buyer and will be indicated upon order registration.
The selling price of a product may be modified at any time, and this modification will be notified to the web buyer before any order validation.

The prices mentioned in the catalog are indicated in DZD (Algerian Dinar) including taxes, valid at the time of consultation by the web buyer, and are those in effect at the time of order registration.
The order form and transactions are denominated in DZD.
The minimum amount per transaction is 200 DZD.
The web buyer has the right to file a claim for non-execution of the order with the web merchant or their bank within 01 hour after order validation.
The web buyer has a period of 15 days from the transaction date to formalize their claim with their bank.

In case of unavailability of the ordered product or service, the web buyer will be notified as soon as possible and will have the option to cancel their order. They will then have the choice to request either a full refund of the amount for the unavailable product or service or the exchange of the product or service.
The refund will be made exclusively through the web buyer's bank, with whom they must contact for this purpose.
All data provided by the web buyer is necessary for order processing and will be treated confidentially.
This confidentiality may be lifted in case of fraud or at the request of judicial authorities.
The web buyer may receive advertisements from Hanuut Express unless they refuse to have their personal data used for commercial and advertising purposes.
The recorded transaction data constitutes evidence of all commercial transactions between the web buyer and Hanuut Express.
The bank account statement also constitutes evidence of transactions made by credit card via the website.
The minimum amount per transaction is 200 DZD.

sections.title: 4. Termination
paragraphs: In the event of non-compliance with these general terms and conditions of sale, Hanuut Express reserves the right, without compensation or notice, to suspend or close the user's account and to refuse them all or part of the service in the future, without prejudice to any legal actions that may be taken against them.

sections.title: 5. Effective Date
paragraphs: In case of non-compliance with these general terms and conditions of sale, Hanuut Express reserves the right, without compensation or notice, to suspend or close the user's account and to refuse them all or part of the service in the future, without prejudice to any legal actions that may be taken against them.

sections.title: 6. Applicable Law:
paragraphs: These general terms and conditions are subject to Algerian law.

sections.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
paragraphs: All disputes of any kind that may arise between the user and Hanuut Express regarding the interpretation, validity, and/or execution of the general terms and conditions will be resolved amicably by the parties. In the absence of an amicable settlement, the disputes will be submitted to the competent Algerian jurisdiction.

sections.title: 8. Modification
paragraphs: Hanuut Express may modify or update these terms and conditions at any time without prior notice.

home_partner_desc: Join the digital revolution. Digitize your inventory, manage orders, and grow your business with My Hanuut.
homeParagraph: The complete digital market. Order from local restaurants and verified shops, or browse ads to buy and sell goods with people nearby. From fresh food to second-hand deals, find it all here.
partnersHero_subheading: Get a professional Digital Menu and Cash Register on your phone in minutes. Reduce mistakes, serve customers faster, and never lose track of your stock again.
home_vision_desc: Why download ten apps when you need just one? Buy fresh groceries from trusted shops, order dinner from local restaurants, or find great deals on used items from your neighbors. Safe, verified, and local.
howItWorksStep1_text: Browse verified shops for new products or check the marketplace for second-hand deals nearby.
howItWorksStep2_text: Add to cart for instant delivery, or chat directly with sellers to negotiate prices.
howItWorksStep3_text: Track your driver in real-time. Pay cash on delivery or online‚Äîit‚Äôs your choice.
partnersValue1_description: Don't limit your sales to opening hours. Give customers a link to browse your products and order even when your doors are closed.
partnersValue2_description: Track every item. Get alerts before products expire. Know exactly what is selling and what is sitting on the shelf.
partnersValue3_description: Give your customers a modern experience with a digital menu and professional receipts. Stand out from the competition.
features_supermarkets_1_desc: Stock your shelves in seconds. Scan any barcode to auto-fill product details. No typing required.
features_supermarkets_2_desc: Never throw away food again. The app alerts you when products are close to expiring so you can put them on sale.
features_food_1_desc: Let customers scan a QR code at their table to view your menu and order. Faster service, fewer waiter errors.
features_food_2_desc: Orders go straight to the kitchen. No shouting, no lost paper tickets. Just organized, timely preparation.
features_ecom_1_desc: Get a sleek, professional web page for your brand. Upload high-quality images and tell your story without writing a single line of code.
features_ecom_2_desc: Selling clothes or gadgets? Easily manage different sizes, colors, and models. Inventory updates automatically as you sell.
features_ecom_3_desc: Don't just sell to your neighborhood. Accept orders from anywhere and manage shipping logistics directly from the dashboard.
